price: 3. Wuxuu kuugu soo dejiyey (Nabiyow) Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) si xaq ah, isagoo rumeyn wixii ka horreeyey (oo Kutub Alle ah), Wuxuuna soo dejiyey Towraadda iyo Injiilka,
arabic: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَنزَلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: nazzala ʿalayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi wa-anzala al-tawrāta wal-injīla
